TestDescription.name: SSL 2.0 deprecated protocol

WASPDescription.DetaliedInformation: The remote service accepts connections encrypted using SSL 2.0, which suffers from several cryptographic flaws and has been deprecated.

TestDescription.Description: The remote service encrypts traffic using an old deprecated protocol with known weaknesses.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker may be able to exploit these issues to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks or decrypt communications between the affected service and clients.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Disable SSL 2.0 and use SSL 3.0 or TLS 1.0 instead.
